welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Horizon City, where you'll find an abundance of charm and beauty. Known for its breathtaking scenery and friendly locals, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that this city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at El Paso International Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: Terminal B is a smaller terminal used for regional and commuter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport by selecting the 'ELP Free WiFi' network.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Abraham Gonzalez International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Abraham Gonzalez International Airport, mainly used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Biggs AAF Airport serves both civilian and military flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
